Roy,

in a number of postings you write, that you did not in depth cover the  
topic of media type design in your dissertation. No problem I thought,  
I'll just fire a search on fielding+"media type design" and should be  
taken to a bunch email snippets that I could harvest.

Turns out that most hits are on the phrase "the entire topic of media  
type design which I left out because I ran out of time" :-)

Could you suggest a more suitable query or a certain forum or even  
references I could take as a starting point for an investigation?


Thanks,

Jan
